DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose study effect mindfulness training eat behavior dietary intake overweight obese person . Mindfulness skills train involves bring non-judgmental attention thought , emotion bodily sensation - include hunger satiety cue . It hypothesize subject advance 8-week class series , develop capacity mindfulness effect learn pay attention sensation , assumption , cognition , belief underlie eat behavior , eat behavior improve . Specifically , investigator hypothesize 1 ) significant improvement area uncontrolled emotional eating , 2 ) significant decrease total caloric intake significant increase fruit vegetable , 3 ) positive significant relationship frequency/consistency mindfulness practice improvement baseline follow-up measure .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Mindfulness Training Eating Behaviors Food Intake
